trans-unit.source: Provides a type resolver for managed types.
trans-unit.target: Gir et type-Løsningsprogram for forvaltet typer.

trans-unit.source: This type resolver can be used with the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class to include in the serialized JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string the assembly-qualified name of any managed type that requires custom type metadata.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen artikkelløseren kan bare brukes med den <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>klassen for å inkludere i serialisert JavaScript objektet notasjon (JSON) streng samlingen kvalifiserte navnet på behandlede typen som krever egendefinert type metadata.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SimpleTypeResolver class enables you to serialize managed types as JSON while retaining the managed type definition for custom types.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SimpleTypeResolver mulig å serialisere forvaltede typer som JSON under beholde den forvaltede Typedefinisjonen for egendefinerte typer.

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> class that uses a type resolver, you must use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Til å opprette en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>klassen som bruker et type-Løsningsprogram, må du bruke den <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver%29> </xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.SimpleTypeResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.SimpleTypeResolver"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified name.
The ResolveType method calls the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to resolve the type.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall ResolveType den <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å løse typen.</xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the managed type.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen kvalifiserte navnet på den behandlede typen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that has the specified name, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>objekt med det angitte navnet hvis fant; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the assembly-qualified name of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer samlingen kvalifiserte navnet på den angitte <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the assembly-qualified name of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder samlingen kvalifiserte navnet på den angitte typen.
